mapper.select: select file_id, file_oldFileName, file_newFileName, file_ext, file_path, file_size, file_type, file_isImg, file_downcounts, file_uploadTime from file_updown.fileupdown_file where file_id = #{fileId}
select file_id, file_oldFileName, file_newFileName, file_ext, file_path, file_size, file_type, file_isImg, file_downcounts, file_uploadTime from file_updown.fileupdown_file limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select f.file_id, f.file_oldFileName, f.file_newFileName, f.file_ext, f.file_path, f.file_size, f.file_type, f.file_isImg, f.file_downcounts, f.file_uploadTime from fileupdown_file f left join fileupdown_file_and_user uf on f.file_id = uf.file_id where uf.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into file_updown.fileupdown_file(file_oldFileName, file_newFileName, file_ext, file_path, file_size, file_type, file_isImg, file_downcounts, file_uploadTime) values (#{fileOldfilename}, #{fileNewfilename}, #{fileExt}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{fileIsimg}, #{fileDowncounts}, #{fileUploadtime})
mapper.update:
update file_updown.fileupdown_file
file_oldFileName = #{fileOldfilename},
file_newFileName = #{fileNewfilename},
file_ext = #{fileExt},
file_path = #{filePath},
file_size = #{fileSize},
file_type = #{fileType},
file_isImg = #{fileIsimg},
file_downcounts = #{fileDowncounts},
file_uploadTime = #{fileUploadtime},
where file_id = #{fileId}
